changes: MAJOR: Added mandatory ground-truth verification against external databases (UniProt, NCBI)
Added verification_sources.json defining authoritative databases and verification protocols
AAP verification now REQUIRES fetching canonical sequence from UniProt (not just +1 frame heuristics)
Added non-skippable checkpoints that block modifications if verification fails
Pre-Flight Reports now include 'Verification Status' (VERIFIED/UNVERIFIED)
Reports must document: source database, accession, fetch timestamp, alignment results
Added fallback handling when external sources are unavailable
Agent cannot silently skip verification - must document all attempts and failures
Added plasmid type classification (Transfer, Rep-Cap Helper, etc.)
Added context-aware cis-element detection (TRS only valid in ITR)
Added mandatory independent verification for overlapping ORFs (AAP)
Added serotype-specific anchor motif handling
Added persistent Pre-Flight Report generation with metadata
Added reports/ directory with template
Initial release
Core agent instructions
Cis-element manifest with AAV elements
Parts library with linker designs
AAV VHH v1 project context
Environment validation script
